name: Squad Goals
description: A NextJS app created to track game sessions and player deaths. Uses realtime player updates and social features like friend requests and friend groups.

name: KamaTimer
description:
A Pomodoro Timer Web App created to keep focused, featuring customizable focus/break timing and a dark mode.

(Named after 'kamatis' which means 'tomato' in Tagalog)

name: WhatDo.io
description:
A Full Stack CRUD app for tracking shared expenses, so people can get paid back. Features user authentication with JWTs to track your expenses on the go.

Built the backend REST API using MongoDB, Express and Node.js, with the front end using React and Tailwind.

name: Frontend Mentor
description:
A collection of the challenges I have completed as part of Frontend Mentor.

Frontend Mentor challenges help you improve your coding skills by building realistic projects.
